Instruction: In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, and salt. Add the butter and mix until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
In a separate bowl, cream together butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add the egg and vanilla, mixing until well combined.
Knead the dough briefly on a floured surface until smooth, then roll it out to a thickness of about 1/2 inch. Use a round cookie cutter to cut out shapes and place them on the prepared baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven for 12 to 15 minutes, or until golden brown.
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
